nodes.text: The Kitonak were a sentient species with pink skin and small eyes that was native to the planet Kirdo III. Their bodies released a vanilla-like scent. They boasted thick, leathery skin, which allowed them to adapt to desert climates[source?] as their tough skin protected them from the sun.
The musician Droopy McCool from Kirdo III was a Kitonak. His true name was a series of whistles only pronounceable by other Kitonaks.
A colony of Kitonaks was rumored to exist on Tatooine, near Mos Eisley.
Thaddeeus Marien was a male Kitonak who lived in the Reestkii settlement on Jakku.
